root      3034     1  0 May08 ?        00:00:00 /bin/sh /usr/bin/mysqld_safe
mysql     3306  3034  4 May08 ?        20:25:40 /usr/sbin/mysqld --basedir=/usr --datadir=/mnt/data-store/mysql/data --user=mysql --log-error=/mnt/data-store/mysql/mysql.err --pid-file=/mnt/data-store/mysql/data/mysql.pid --socket=/tmp/mysql.sock --port=3306
